Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which contains three disulfide bonds 4-20; 8-22; 13-27.

Literature.Title: Plant cyclotides A unique family of cyclic and knotted proteins that defines the cyclic cystine knot structural motif.
Literature.Author: Craik DJ, Daly NL, Bond T, Waine C.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of novel cyclotides from Viola hederaceae: solution structure and anti-HIV activity of vhl-1, a leaf-specific expressed cyclotide.
Literature.Author: Gustafson K.R.,Rosengren K.J.,Daly N.L.,Colgrave M.L.,Chen B.
